scripts.install: cp src/main.js src/main_temp.js && replace  'sprites/' 'assets/jueguito/sprites/' src/main_temp.js && replace  'fonts/' 'assets/jueguito/fonts/' src/main_temp.js&& esbuild src/main_temp.js --bundle > www/main.js && ncp src/main.js ../../home/personalPage/src/assets/jueguito/main.js && ncp www ../../home/personalPage/src/assets/jueguito/ -r && rm src/main_temp.js
